name: py-pyhdf

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
pyhdf is a python wrapper around the NCSA HDF version 4 library. The SD
(Scientific Dataset), VS (Vdata) and V (Vgroup) APIs are currently
implemented. NetCDF files can also be read and modified.

dependencies.name: hdf
dependencies.description:
HDF4 (also known as HDF) is a library and multi-object file format for
storing and managing data between machines.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg is a widely used free library with functions for handling the
JPEG image data format. It implements a JPEG codec (encoding and
decoding) alongside various utilities for handling JPEG data.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
